scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:coverage
scripts.build:extension: mkdir -p dist/extension && cp stack/extension/manifest.json dist/extension/ && esbuild stack/extension/service-worker.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/extension/service-worker.js --format=iife --target=chrome100 && esbuild stack/extension/overlay/main.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/extension/overlay.js --format=iife --target=chrome100
scripts.dev:watch: npm run build:extension && (tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput & esbuild stack/extension/service-worker.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/extension/service-worker.js --format=iife --target=chrome100 --watch & esbuild stack/extension/overlay/main.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/extension/overlay.js --format=iife --target=chrome100 --watch)
